summary: A comedy about life (or the lack thereof) in Academia. Two young scientists (a Quantum Physicist and a Molecular Biologist) search for significance in the high stakes world of Academic research.
cast: Zachary Abbott|Kari Alison Hodge|Roy Allen III|Evans Boney|Susanna Boney|Tim Boyd|Ken Breese|Anthony Chu|Katie Condidorio|Crystal Dilworth|Precious Holloway|Barbera Ann Howard|Raj Katti|Alexandra Lockwood|Jenney McAfee|Fawzia Mirza|Miranda Stewart|Julian Yuen|Carol Elaine Cyr
title: Piled Higher and Deeper: Still in Grad School
